## EffectsSubscriber class

Responsible for injecting effects (see [Effect](./state-management.effect.md)<!-- -->) within its provider scope Effects are handled be subscribing and dispatching the returning actions to the store.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class EffectsSubscriber 
```

|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [onEffectsInit$](./state-management.effectssubscriber.oneffectsinit_.md) |  | Observable&lt;boolean&gt; | A lifecycle hook that emits when all effects are subscribed to. |
